sections.heading: Asian Pacific American Affairs Commission. Membership. Vacancies. Duties. Annual report. Staff. Authority.
sections.text:
Section 2-122 is repealed, effective July 1, 2016.

(P.A. 08-166, S. 1; Sept. Sp. Sess. P.A. 09-7, S. 145; P.A. 10-1, S. 4; June 12 Sp. Sess. P.A. 12-2, S. 41; May Sp. Sess. P.A. 16-3, S. 209.)
